originalText.text: Dr Born is a magician. I have been a patient of his for over 20 years and he never disappoints in giving me the most natural and beautiful results. He's a true artist. Every step of the way from consultation to surgery, staff, and aftercare has been extremely professional, courteous, and comforting. I completely trust him and highly recommend him if you want to like look you but only better.

text.text: Dr Born is a magician. I have been a patient of his for over 20 years and he never disappoints in giving me the most natural and beautiful results. He's a true artist. originalText.text:
The BEST! I travel all the way from San Francisco to see Dr. Born, because he is THAT GOOD!

His skill and talent will have you looking effortlessly refreshed. This is not easy to achieve and Dr. Born does it better than anyone I know. Additionally, His counsel and bedside manner will confidently yield an unsurpassable experience. You are not only in good hands with Dr. Born, you are in the BEST hands.

You want the artistry of a Michelangelo, with the skill of a world renowned surgeon and that is Dr. Trevor Born.

originalText.text:
I had buccal fat pad removal surgery with Dr Born and it was the best decision I ever made!

Dr Born is a highly skilled Plastic Surgeon who truly understands aesthetics. He transformed and enhanced my face, while keeping my overall look completely natural. He’s a true artist in this regard! He’s very detail oriented and focused on giving the best results possible with proper care and safety. He’s also very compassionate and friendly and takes the time to explain everything. I’m so happy with my overall experience — I feel like I have my confidence back!

Dr Born's team (including Mandy, Lauren and Janine) are very professional and accommodating, especially for those with busy schedules. I also had the pleasure of being under the care of Kristina Salvi FNP-BC, who is highly skilled in operational management, very attentive and great at making sure everything runs seamlessly.

I’m also a long time patient of Dr Born’s wife, Dr Lisa Airan MD (a highly experienced board certified dermatologist in NYC). Together they are an amazing team — hands down best in North America.

originalText.text: Dr. Born’s expertise, artistry and essence all exude quiet elegance. That’s what you can expect from any interaction with him-from phone, office or surgery. The team surrounding him is the same. Authentic beauty. - Grace A
